name: Blue Cuban Short Sleeve Shirt | The Fuji Merchant
description: Known for their bold mastery of colour, pattern and embroidery, Hackney-born Percival's energetic reimagining of classic British shapes gives them a timeless charm. And these embroidered socks are a subtle way to express your personal style.

name: Blue Cuban Short Sleeve Shirt | Ukiyo-e Scene
description: British shapes gives them a timeless charm. Made from 100% Japanese cotton, this Cuban shirt features a bold, bright and traditional Japanese ukiyo-e scene. Completely unique in its style, it exudes the feeling of vacation
